item.title: Pi -Help
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

[quote=“xXxSkillerxXx, post:1, topic:408622”]ok so someone gave me this code:

[quote] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“reward”)) {
if (c.vote == 1) {
c.getPA().showInterface(19050);
} else if (c.vote == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You haven’t voted.”);
}[/quote]
And i want to know where i can find out where:

vote == 1

Is in my PI source.(or were the other variables are like PK Points and what not.)
in delta its in PlayerHandler (or sumthing like that.) and im trying to figure it out anyone help?[/quote]

I gave you that code, and it was about 2 minutes ago -.-

Client.class:
Player.Class:
PlayerSave.Class:

That’s where you can find the ints, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Pi -Help
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

ok so someone gave me this code:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("reward")) { if (c.vote == 1) { c.getPA().showInterface(19050); } else if (c.vote == 0) { c.sendMessage("You haven't voted."); }
And i want to know where i can find out where:
vote == 1
Is in my PI source.(or were the other variables are like PK Points and what not.) in delta its in PlayerHandler (or sumthing like that.) and im trying to figure it out anyone help?

Read full topic
